summary.span: 表示將 項目裝載於其儲存格內的 資料行。

span.span: Represents a column that hosts elements in its cells.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用來顯示資料，其中包含，例如 HTTP 地址或電子郵件地址。Use to display data that contains a , such as an HTTP address or email address. 下圖顯示的範例。The following illustration shows an example of a . ![電子郵件地址的 DataGridHyperlinkColumn](~/add/media/wpf-hyperlinkcolumn.png "電子郵件地址的 DataGridHyperlinkColumn")![DataGridHyperlinkColumn with email addresses](~/add/media/wpf-hyperlinkcolumn.png "DataGridHyperlinkColumn with email addresses") > [!NOTE] > 當其中一個，才可以進行瀏覽的直接或間接父系是瀏覽的主機。 navigation can only occur if either the direct or indirect parent of a is a navigation host. 巡覽裝載的範例包括， ，或可以裝載任何瀏覽器[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbapsharpplural-md.md)]，例如[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie6](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie6-md.md)]或更新版本和 Firefox 2.0 或更新版本。Examples of navigation hosts include , , or any browser that can host [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbapsharpplural-md.md)], such as [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie6](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie6-md.md)] or later and Firefox 2.0 or later. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱中的 瀏覽主機 」 主題[巡覽概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/navigation-overview.md)。For more information, see the "Navigation Hosts" topic in [Navigation Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/navigation-overview.md). 若要填入資料行，資料行繫結至資料使用屬性。To populate the column, bind the column to the data by using the property. 若要顯示不同的 URI 字串的超連結文字，繫結的文字值屬性。To display hyperlink text that is different than the URI string, bind the text value to the property. 屬性會套用到或建立資料行中的項目。The property is applied to the or element created in the column. 中每個資料格中的項目是資料列的資料項目是資料格。The for the element in each cell is the data item for the row the cell is in. 因此，若要設定繫結只需要設定。Therefore, to set up the binding you only have to set the . 您可以選擇性地指定如果您想要將資料轉換。Optionally, you can specify a if you want to convert the data. 如需資料繫結的詳細資訊，請參閱[資料繫結 (WPF)](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-wpf.md)。For more information about data binding, see [Data Binding (WPF)](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-wpf.md). > [!NOTE] > 建立非編輯模式中的項目和編輯模式中的項目。 creates a element in the non-editing mode and a element in the editing mode. 如果您想要顯示其他類型的資料，提供下列資料行類型：If you want to display other types of data, provides the following column types: |資料行型別Column Type|資料顯示Data Display| |-----------------|------------------| ||用於顯示布林值資料。Use to display Boolean data.| ||用於顯示列舉型別資料。Use to display enumeration data.| ||用於顯示文字。Use to display text.| 如果您想要使用其他控制項，在您，您可以使用，以建立您自己的資料行類型。If you want to use other controls in your , you can create your own column types by using . ## Examples 下列範例所示設定與屬性和超連結文字與屬性。The following example shows a that sets the with the property and the hyperlink text with the property. 事件會自動處理，因為的父系。The event is handled automatically because is the parent of the .
